para.text: All classes support the definition of user defined properties and methods. All container controls support nested objects that can be accessed by name.

Implemented as .NET control. The following members are available:

li.text: Caption. The "\<" escape character for shortcuts is not supported.

para.text: The caption can be a Unicode string. Since the FXP format doesn't support Unicode properties, you currently have to use FILETOSTR() to create a Unicode string.

Windows Mobile 5 and later displays tabs at the bottom rather than the top.

para.link: Editbox Control Properties, Methods, and Events
para.text: for a list of implemented members.

The control supports Unicode. Entering Unicode characters is possible at all times. When the value property is accessed, all characters that are not in the current codepage are converted to question marks.
Implemented as .NET control. The following members are available:

li.text: Value. Currently, only character values and date values are supported.
ControlSource. Only character values and date values are supported. Modified data is not written back.
. Only the Enter key is supported.
